TopicTitle: Mr. Robot and other neat shows you've been watching lately.

Articles.Content:
As the title states, I've been watching Mr. Robot and absolutely love the show. For anyone who hasn't heard of the show yet, here is an IMDB summary:

[http://www.imdb.com/title/tt4158110/](https://www.imdb.com/title/tt4158110/)

It's extremely entertaining and accurate when it comes to the underground hacking world (from my own experience, as well as other anecdotes). Are there any shows any of you watching that you really enjoy?

never heard of it. i'm going to check it out

i just finished watching all 9 series of the x-files.. i was too young to understand when they were first aired, and in my country they were broadcasted at a late hour so i only saw some bits and pieces back then.

now that i viewed all episodes i think it was pretty damn good. and scully is (was) f'ing hot. rawr.

anyone exited about the revival? i wonder how they are going to explain the entire colonization thing that was supposed to happen in 2012..
